archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains Amanda Mouser's Honors Thesis titled, "The History of History: A History of the History Department at Virginia Tech, 1966-2009."

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Amanda Mouser Honors Thesis must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Amanda Mouser Honors Thesis, Ms2009-123, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Amanda Mouser Honors Thesis was donated to Special Collections in May 2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Amanda Mouser Honors Thesis commenced and was completed in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The thesis describes the evolution of the study of history at Virginia Tech through an analysis of the developmemt and growth of the History Department, beginning in 1966. In addition to the department as a whole, the thesis also discusses the importance of individual faculty and staff.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University--Dept. of History.
